Articles.Content:
Anyone who watches Top Gear, the British one, obviously, will know that they created a fake intro for a show called "The Interceptors", back in Season 17.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/qLp4FhDAfQk?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

As it may suggest, this is that intro recreated in KSP to the best of my ability.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/hJDQfBJ9L5U?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
